import React from 'react' function LoginForm({Login, error}) { const [details, setDetails] = React.useState({name:"", email:"", password:""}); const submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); Login(details) } return (

Login

{(error != "") ? (
{error}
) : ""}
setDetails({ ...details, name: event.target.value }) } value={details.name} />
setDetails({ ...details, email: event.target.value }) } value={details.email} />
setDetails({ ...details, password: event.target.value }) } value={details.password} />
); } export default LoginForm
